column1: # The table below defines the meaning of characters 9-10 in the alphanumeric
# identification code, of the simulations already performed in the frame of the
# AdriaClim INTERREG IT-HR project, by ARPA FVG (PP11).
# It is worth to remind that characters 9-10 are reserved to the identification
# number of the time coverage of the simulation.

column3: Monthly coverage for a range of contiguous months
